entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 6 May 2023
